name: Zoo Animal Transport Truck Driving and Parking Mania
name_original: Zoo Animal Transport Truck Driving and Parking Mania
description:
Are you ready to accept the challenge of handling wild zoo animals? Show some courage and join this adventure ride. Transport animals like Lion, Elephants, Gorilla from one city zoo to another. Animal movement control is added to enhance the thrill and excitement.

You are the truck driver assigned with the job of transporting these wild animals. Move and load them onto your transporter truck. Get behind the steering wheel and hit the road. Drive carefully and deliver the animals safe and sound to their destination. Park your truck at the pre-defined parking spot to complete the challenge.

Features:
• Wild zoo animals control added
. Added new animals like Deer and Gorilla
• Heavy trailer driving through the city
• Smooth and easy controls
. 10 exciting and challenging transport missions
• Attractive and user friendly graphics
